page.title: 13FAVOURITE SPORTS
page.content: People in our school like to do lots of different things with their spare time. One of the favourite sports is football. Lots of the boys like to play football. We have a teacher who takes children skiing. A lot of the children like to do this. Swimming is also popular. Some children go to swimming clubs like the Penguins which is held in Penicuik High School. Other sport children like are cricket, horse riding, tennis and snooker. Although most children participate in sporting activities in their spare time some prefer more leisurely hobbies. Fishing is a popular hobby and some people also tie their own flies. Reading and playing with computers are also popular. A few people prefer things like model making and bird watching.
